Hi Dalia,

1. Honeybee doesn't have a component for that, but it's pretty straightforward to do it using Radiance's PValue ([http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/pvalue.1.html](http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/man_html/pvalue.1.html)). If you are more comfortable using an interface then try wxFalseColor ([http://tbleicher.github.io/wxfalsecolor/](http://tbleicher.github.io/wxfalsecolor/)).



2. Not possible at the moment.



Mostapha
